title: Covalex Local Shipment Route
description:
Hi,

Got an decent sized order ready for pick up at the ~mission(Pickup1) at ~mission(Pickup1|Address). Just make sure you got a ship big enough to load it all up! 

PACKAGES FOR PICK UP 
     · All Packages in the ~mission(Pickup1) at ~mission(Pickup1|Address)

DROP OFF LOCATIONS (ANY ORDER)
     · Package #~mission(item1|serialnumber) to the ~mission(Dropoff1|Address)
     · Package #~mission(item2|serialnumber) to the ~mission(Dropoff2|Address)
     · Package #~mission(item3|serialnumber) to the ~mission(Dropoff3|Address)
     · Package #~mission(item4|serialnumber) to the ~mission(Dropoff4|Address)
     · Package #~mission(item5|serialnumber) to the ~mission(Dropoff5|Address)
     · Package #~mission(item6|serialnumber) to the ~mission(Dropoff5|Address)
     · Package #~mission(item7|serialnumber) to the ~mission(Dropoff6|Address)
     · Package #~mission(item8|serialnumber) to the ~mission(Dropoff6|Address)
     · Package #~mission(item9|serialnumber) to the ~mission(Dropoff7|Address)
     · Package #~mission(item10|serialnumber) to the ~mission(Dropoff7|Address)

Have a great day,

Chase Hewitt
Jr. Logistics Coordinator
Covalex Shipping  
'Anything you need, anywhere you need it.'
